description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a Settings screen, including UI components and interaction logic for app preferences such as theme, notifications, data sync, and about info.

classes.name: SettingsScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a settings UI allowing users to configure app preferences.

classes.name: _SettingsScreenState
classes.description: State class for SettingsScreen managing UI interactions and rendering.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state and loads settings after the first frame.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the overall settings UI as a Scaffold with different sections.

methods.name: _buildThemePreviewCard
methods.description: Builds a card showing theme preview and color palette.

methods.name: _buildColorChip
methods.description: Creates a color chip with label and color.

methods.name: _buildNotificationsSection
methods.description: Builds a section with notification toggle options.

methods.name: _buildSyncSection
methods.description: Builds a data synchronization section with auto-sync toggle and last sync info.

methods.name: _buildEventTypesSection
methods.description: Builds a placeholder section for event type customization.

methods.name: _buildAboutSection
methods.description: Builds an about section displaying app info.
